verses.verse: Hezekiah<WH3169> sent<WH7971> to all Israel<WH3478> and Judah,<WH3063> and wrote<WH3789> letters<WH107> also to Ephraim<WH669> and Manasseh,<WH4519> that they should come<WH935> to the house<WH1004> of Yahweh<WH3068> at Jerusalem,<WH3389> to keep<WH6213> the Passover<WH6453> to Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel.<WH3478>
